stories.title: Cammie the CME
stories.subtitle: Coronal Mass Ejection Adventure
stories.description: Join Cammie, a glowing cloud of solar particles, as she leaves the Sun on an exciting journey to Earth!

chapters.title: Cammie's Big Decision
chapters.text: Hi! I'm Cammie, a Coronal Mass Ejection from the Sun! I'm made of billions of tiny particles, and today I'm zooming toward Earth. But I have a choice to make...

chapters.title: The Gentle Visit
chapters.text: I decided to take it slow! As I reach Earth's magnetic field, I create beautiful dancing auroras in the sky. People below look up in wonder at the green and purple lights!

chapters.title: The Wild Rush!
chapters.text: Whoosh! I'm rushing toward Earth super fast! My powerful energy hits satellites and creates spectacular auroras, but I also cause some communication problems. Uh oh!

chapters.title: A Beautiful Show
chapters.text: Thanks to my gentle approach, Earth enjoyed a beautiful light show without any problems! Scientists were happy, and people took amazing photos of the auroras. Mission accomplished!

chapters.title: Learning to Be Careful
chapters.text: My wild energy created amazing auroras, but also disrupted some technology. Next time, I'll remember that being powerful means being responsible! Earth's magnetic field protected everyone, though!

stories.title: Raye the GCR
stories.subtitle: Galactic Cosmic Ray Adventure
stories.description: Meet Raye, a speedy galactic cosmic ray zipping through space and leaving tiny sparkles in her wake!

chapters.title: Raye's Journey
chapters.text: Hi! I'm Raye, a galactic cosmic ray racing across the galaxy. I love bouncing through magnetic fields and painting little glints on planets!

chapters.title: A Gentle Brush
chapters.text: Raye glides gently past a planet, creating shimmering micro-auroras that make the sky twinkle softly.

chapters.title: A Zippy Impact
chapters.text: Raye zips too quickly and causes an unexpected bright flash. It's exciting but reminds Raye to be mindful.

chapters.title: Soft Glow
chapters.text: Raye's gentle pass gave the planet tiny sparkles and a soft glow‚Äîeveryone smiled and photographed the sky.

chapters.title: Lesson Learned
chapters.text: Raye learned that speed is fun but care matters‚Äînext time she'll pick a kinder route.
